caption: Table 1: Overall performance of steering the utilisation of parametric and contextual knowledge, measured by EMM and EMC. "Without Controlling" indicates the baseline that we do not use any controlling methods to steer the generation. #ICL is not an inference-time controlling strategy, which controls the behaviours by changing demonstrations. CAD needs additional forwarding for contrastive decoding.
description: Table 1 presents the overall performance comparison of different methods in steering the usage of parametric and contextual knowledge in LLMs for two datasets, measured by exact match accuracy.

caption: Table 1: Overall performance of steering the utilisation of parametric and contextual knowledge, measured by EMM and EMC. "Without Controlling" indicates the baseline that we do not use any controlling methods to steer the generation. #ICL is not an inference-time controlling strategy, which controls the behaviours by changing demonstrations. CAD needs additional forwarding for contrastive decoding.
description: Table 1 presents the overall performance comparison of different methods on steering the usage of parametric and contextual knowledge in LLMs for two different datasets.
